version_description: We’re constantly improving our app and updates occur on a regular basis. Each update includes speed improvements and bug fixes. Of course we’ll inform you about any new features. Thanks for using LOVOO.

We’re constantly improving our app and updates occur on a regular basis. Each update includes speed improvements and bug fixes. Of course we’ll inform you about any new features. Thanks for using LOVOO.

That moment when nobody says anything and time seems to stand still... yes, a new update is always so special. We have butterflies in our stomach every time. By the way, we also eliminated a few bugs. It doesn’t get more romantic than this.

We’re constantly improving our app and updates occur on a regular basis. Each update includes speed improvements and bug fixes. Of course we’ll inform you about any new features. Thanks for using LOVOO.

Oh man, we are excited. Pretty much so A bit like before a first date. Our newest update is like a Happy Meal: A little bit of everything is in there. New look, new dashboard and a ton of new features.

From now on you see at a glance, which users in your neighborhood are new to LOVOO and can easily find people again that you liked before.

Aaaand: VIP is now called Premium and has a lot more features. Above all, it helps you to find more dates, more fun and more great experiences. Enjoy!

Oh man, we are excited. Pretty much so A bit like before a first date. Our newest update is like a Happy Meal: A little bit of everything is in there. New look, new dashboard and a ton of new features.

From now on you see at a glance, which users in your neighborhood are new to LOVOO and can easily find people again that you liked before.

Aaaand: VIP is now called Premium and has a lot more features. Above all, it helps you to find more dates, more fun and more great experiences. Enjoy!

Did someone say Lisbon? Yessss! Not only do we have a brand new version for you, we are also sending you off on a weekend away to Portugal! How? Just send us an e-mail to stories@lovoo.com telling us about all your LOVOO experiences – from chatting to a date from hell, through to a big love story. Give it to me!

Did someone say Lisbon? Yessss! Not only do we have a brand new version for you, we are also sending you off on a weekend away to Portugal! How? Just send us an e-mail to stories@lovoo.com telling us about all your LOVOO experiences – from chatting to a date from hell, through to a big love story. Give it to me!

Since it’s likely that no one will read this, we won’t bother putting much effort in. We won’t tell you how great our new update is and everything you will miss out on if you don’t get this version. Nope. We also won’t reveal what new features it has and that your life will be meaningless without our update. We won’t waste our time. There are so many important... Oh, Season 6 of Suits is on Netflix?

Our latest update was such a hit, the club got crowded quickly so we had to close the doors. Sorry for kicking you out! With our new update you get in again – and stay for good.

Our registration process has been improved. From now on, new users will benefit from:
- an optimized selection of photos.
- a preview of your own Match card.
- improved functionality for image cropping.
- helpful tips during registration.
- a more realistic profile picture size.
This update contains simple bug fixes and performance improvements. We would love to tell you more about them, but why bother? It would be super boring and we only want to tell interesting news.
This update contains simple bug fixes and performance improvements. We would love to tell you more about them, but why bother? It would be super boring and we only want to tell interesting news.

At the moment, dating is hardly possible. Nobody goes without dates here, because we have continued to work on next|date for you.
Go into Blind Date mode and make your next|date EVEN more exciting! Your date will be normal, but you won't be able to see him or her. Your date will only be visible when you get a match.
You can now find out in the news which match comes from next|date.

Thanks to our latest update, you can now see the matches you got with the boost in your News and Chats. So go ahead and start the boost rocket

In the mood for a surprise?

For the new surprise of the day, we have
• shortened the animations so that you can get your reward more quickly.
• added some more information so that everyone knows where they have to tap.
• tidied up the design.

The app now also notes the prize you selected for day 7 and automatically sets it. Changed your mind? Not a problem! You can now change it every day.

And what’s happening on Live?
• In the Battle, the chats of both streamers are now connected. The audience gets to interact and the fighting spirit is stronger than ever.
• How close are you to the VIP Badge? Now you get to find out. You can now decide whether you want to show or hide your badge and whether there should be a special announcement when you join a stream. Exciting!
The profile tiles of new users which you will see in the list of users nearby, radar, and news center have been given a new look. We simply love beautiful color gradients.

This could be just another ordinary “What’s new” text. But it isn’t. Because this update is the 100th LOVOO version to see the light of day! Yes, you heard right: One hundred releases – that’s how many our developers have brought into existence over the past ten years. Time for a small dedication of love.


Dear Engineers,
Version 100.0 is not only very special for you, but for us as well. This update is the culmination of thousands of hours of work, long nights, even longer meetings, and above all, unwavering commitment. Thank you for your dedication, the countless builds, sprints, and bug fixes. Thank you for breathing life into all our new designs and features in the app. Thank you for working day after day to make LOVOO even better, faster, and more colorful. We look forward to at least a hundred more releases with all of you. Keep on rocking #NaN, #MRQ, #BLU & #PRIME!

Version 101 – A new era begins!
Making LOVOO a safe place is particularly important to us. Unfortunately, we cannot entirely prevent black sheep from getting in every now and then. However, to ensure that they can be eliminated as quickly as possible, we have expanded the reporting and block function.
This update contains simple bug fixes and performance improvements. We would love to tell you more about them, but why bother? It would be super boring and we only want to tell interesting news.
